questions.question_text: In the base system, what is the default number of cards that can be displayed in the project workspace?

discussion.content: Same question as No.158. However, 158 answers are requirements, tasks, and stakeholders. Not Decisions. I don't know which is correct.

Who can enhance/manage demands?
Demand managers can enhance a demand request by adding stakeholders, requirements, risks, decisions, and resource plans.
https://quizlet.com/ca/504824511/servicenow-cis-ppm-project-portfolio-management-orlando-flash-cards/

Selected Answer: ADE
ADE is correct

questions.question_text: Demand managers can enhance a demand request by adding the following: (Choose three.)

choices.B: Contact the Account Representative to activate the teamspaces.
choices.D: Use UI Policies and Business Rules to enable teamspaces.

questions.question_text: A customer requires five (5) teamspaces to support different departments. What should you do?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Teamspace activation
You must activate a teamspace plugin to use the teamspace feature. Following teamspace plugins are available:

The teamspaces loaded with these plugins contain the same components, but the components have different prefixes. For example, teamspace 1 includes a project table named Teamspace_1 Project [tsp1_project] and teamspace 5 includes a project table named Teamspace_5 Project [tsp5_project].

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-it-business-management/page

Selected Answer: C
c is correct
https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/utah-it-business-management/page/product/project-management/concept/c_Teamspaces.html

Selected Answer: C
C is correct
